Content.title: Angad Bhat
Content.name: Angad Bhat
Content.bodyText:
Hi there,
I am trying to use your package in my umbraco interface. I installed it and everything is fine but when I publish the page(node) I don't get any email as there is one broken link on the page.

I have done umbraco configuration for email set up as the notification feature works fine.

Could you please tell what could possible I be doing wrong. Is there any documentation for this package or something.

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks
